pages.text: In Beyond the Horizon, villagers are safer with the peaceful Overworld. $(br2)No need to imprison them in 'trading halls,' which are really just villager prisons! $(br2)Your villagers can roam free without fear of mobs, and you can trade with them easily.
Craft the Trading Post to simplify trading with your villagers. This block allows you to access multiple trades from a single interface.

Additionally, the pack includes various enhancements to improve your interaction with villagers. These include: $(br2)$(l)Trade Cycling$() - Efficiently cycle through trades without breaking workstations. $(br2)$(l)Villager Names$() - Adds custom names to villagers for better identification.
$(l)Villagers Added by Mods$() $(br2)This mod pack includes several custom villagers that provide unique trades and functionalities:
$(l)Applied Energistics 2 Villager$() $(br2)- $(l)Fluix Researcher$(): Trades Fluix crystals and related components. $(br2)Workstation: Charger.

$(l)Immersive Engineering Villagers$() $(br2)- Immersive Engineering adds five different types of villagers, each offering unique trades related to engineering and technology. For more details, refer to the $(l:mod_info/immersive_engineering)Immersive Engineering page$() and consult the in-game Immersive Engineering book.
$(l)PneumaticCraft Villager$() $(br2)- $(l)Pressure Mechanic$(): Trades pressure components and blueprints. $(br2)Workstation: Pressure Chamber.
$(l)Advanced Peripherals Villager$() $(br2)- $(l)Computer Scientist$(): Trades computer components and peripherals. $(br2)Workstation: Advanced Computer.
$(l)Etched Villager$() $(br2)- $(l)Bard$(): Trades music-related items and instruments. $(br2)Workstation: Music Stand.

$(l)Farmer's Delight Villagers$() $(br2)- $(l)Chef$(): Trades high-quality food items and recipes. $(br2)Workstation: Cooking Pot. $(br2)- $(l)Cook$(): Trades basic food items and ingredients. $(br2)Workstation: Skillet.
